content:
#!/bin/bash
while true; do
  echo "Starting server..."
  npm run dev -- --host 127.0.0.1 --port 3000
  echo "Server stopped. Restarting in 2 seconds..."
  sleep 2
done

# Run and deploy your AI Studio app This contains everything you need to run your app locally. View your app in AI Studio: https://ai.studio/apps/drive/18WTx8LGZTz7B0DByiIUNPX8bLk0Z5R7w ## Run Locally **Prerequisites:** Node.js 1. Install dependencies: `npm install` 2. Set the `GEMINI_API_KEY` in [.env.local](.env.local) to your Gemini API key 3. Run the app: `npm run dev`
